section1.title: Learn about our English immersion program
section1.description: The main objective of the project is to facilitate the process of appropriation of the foreign language English in the student population of Gimnasio Moderno de Cartagena.

section2.title: Learning English has never been so fun
section2.description: To achieve this objective, we consider as main strategies, the design and implementation of modules in English for the suggested curriculum (natural sciences, mathematics, technologies and those to be added later).

section3.title: Visit to the restaurante
section3.description: Our students had the opportunity to order their favorite breakfast in English and chat with friends.

section3.title: Celebration
section3.description: Through creative presentations and teamwork, children developed their skills in English.

section3.title: Celebration
section3.description: We celebrated Valentine's Day with a special program where they socialized and presented different activities.

section5.title: Get to know our toy library
section5.description: We have an ideal space for our children to learn through playful tools. Get to know our toy library.
